column4: Can someone lead me into the right direction? I'm learning to crack WEP and I have a Zd1211 chipset(thats a USB device) and then I have the BCM4311 thats in my laptop. Is there a channel for this sorta stuff?
Is there a channel here for WEP cracking help?
Locke: Yeah, so I can hack my network & things
You have to have a patched driver for it to work properly. At least I had to patch the atheroes drivers I had.
